fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Once per game, during day 1, instantly guess a player you think is evil.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target is evil, you win, otherwise, you lose.
- Neutral Killing/Genocide roles are evil, other ones are not.
- If you are town, the game ends and your team gets the same result as you, with other roles getting the opposite.
- You ignore any ability or passive that would mess with your ability.
- Evils learn you are in the game.
